mapper.select: SELECT r.resCode, r.facilId, r.resStart, r.resEnd, r.resContent, r.resWriter, r.resTel, r.resRequest, r.resState, f.facilType, f.facilName FROM Reservation r LEFT JOIN Facility f ON r.facilId = f.facilId WHERE r.resState=100 AND r.resWriter=#{resWriter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(resCode, facilId, resWriter, resStart, resEnd, resTel, resContent, resRequest, resState) VALUES(reserv_seq.nextval, #{facilId}, #{resWriter}, #{resStart}, #{resEnd}, #{resTel}, #{resContent}, #{resRequest}, #{resState})
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET resCode=#{resCode}, facilId=#{facilId}, resStart=#{resStart}, resEnd=#{resEnd}, resTel=#{resTel}, resContent=#{resContent}, resRequest=#{resRequest} WHERE resCode=#{resCode}
mapper.select: SELECT r.resCode, r.facilId, r.resStart, r.resEnd, r.resWriter, r.resTel, r.resContent, r.resRequest, r.resState, e.name, e.grade, f.facilType, f.facilName FROM reservation r JOIN emp e ON e.empno=r.resWriter JOIN facility f ON f.facilID=r.facilID WHERE r.resState=100 ORDER BY r.resCode
